localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Plan a full week of meals with a single click. Just tell us which foods you like, and how many calories, protein, fat, and carbs you want to eat. Swap out a meal, a day, or a week! We can fit in your treats, and even give you a grocery list!
blogPost.body: Plan a full week of meals with a single click. Just tell us which foods you like, and how many calories, protein, fat, and carbs you want to eat. Swap out a meal, a day, or a week! We can fit in your treats, and even give you a grocery list!
blogPost.title: Prospre - Generate custom meal plans with one click
blogPost.author: Colin Hunt

localize.description: 只需点击一下，就可以计划一整周的用餐时间。只要告诉我们你喜欢哪些食物，以及你想吃多少卡路里、蛋白质、脂肪和碳水化合物就行了。换一顿饭，换一天，或者换一周！我们可以安排您的款待，甚至还可以给您一张购物清单！
localize.tagline: 只需单击一次即可生成自定义餐饮计划

localize.description: 只需點擊一下，就可以計劃一整週的用餐時間。只要告訴我們你喜歡哪些食物，以及你想喫多少卡路里、蛋白質、脂肪和碳水化合物就行了。換一頓飯，換一天，或者換一週！我們可以安排您的款待，甚至還可以給您一張購物清單！
localize.tagline: 只需單擊一次即可生成自定義餐飲計劃

previous.excerpt: - FIFO queue to automate Github CI/CD workflows - 3 mins quick setup - Avoid conflicts and keep builds green - Keep Pull Requests up to date with the base branches - Automatically dequeue failed builds
previous.title: MergeQueue - Automate Github’s CI/CD in under 3 mins

localize.description: - FIFO队列使Github的CI/CD工作流程自动化 - 3分钟快速设置 - 避免冲突并保持绿色构建 - 保持Pull请求与基础分支的更新 - 自动取消失败构建的queue。
localize.tagline: 在3分钟内自动完成Github的CI/CD工作。

localize.description: - FIFO隊列使Github的CI/CD工作流程自動化 - 3分鐘快速設置 - 避免衝突並保持綠色構建 - 保持Pull請求與基礎分支的更新 - 自動取消失敗構建的queue。
localize.tagline: 在3分鐘內自動完成Github的CI/CD工作。

next.title: Buy and hold is one of the dumbest investment strategies ever that also happens to have the highest probability of success for the vast majority of investors

localize.full_text: 买入并持有是史上最愚蠢的投资策略之一，也恰恰是绝大多数投资者成功概率最高的策略。
買入並持有是史上最愚蠢的投資策略之一，也恰恰是絕大多數投資者成功概率最高的策略。
